product_name: Oakley Pit Boss II Polarized Sunglasses - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The Pit Boss II Sunglasses feature comfortable lightweight frames, high-definition optics and coated polarized lenses that repel water and smudges so you can enjoy your day in the sun.
short_description: The Pit Boss II Sunglasses feature comfortable lightweight frames, high-definition optics and coated polarized lenses that repel water and smudges so you can enjoy your day in the sun.
